## Loading data

```{r cars}
all_data <- read.xlsx(here("all_data.xlsx"))
View(A)
dim(A)

```


## Adjusted prevelence

```{r cars}
all_data$Health_issues <- ifelse(all_data$PH == "Y" | A$MH == "Y", 1, 0)
all_data$Health_issues<-as.factor(all_data$Health_issues)
str(all_data)
model <- glm(Health_issues ~ Age +Smoker+ Belief + SES5 +Gender+Region, data = all_data, family = binomial)
summary(model)## +Region
predict_prob <- predict(model, type = "response")
adjusted_prevalence <- mean(predict_prob)
adjusted_prevalence

```
